references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, significantly improving the efficiency and scalability of diffusion models for generating high-resolution images, an important step for video generation.

references.paper_title: Make-a-video: Text-to-video generation without text-video data
references.reason: This paper presents a significant advancement in diffusion-based video generation, showing the potential of diffusion models to generate high-quality videos directly from text without needing paired text-video data for training.

references.paper_title: Open-Sora: Democratizing efficient video production for all
